channel.title: CVE Feed for publify -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for publify -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-1553|2024-08-03T00:10:03.456Z -- publify -- publify%2Fpublify
item.description: Leaking password protected articles content due to improper access control in GitHub repository publify/publify prior to 9.2.8. Attackers can leverage this vulnerability to view the contents of any password-protected article present on the publify website, compromising confidentiality and integrity of users.
